sum of FIFTEEN HUNDRED and 00/100 DOILARS ($1500.00) as rental
for each succeeding year, until the termination of this
lease, as hereinafter specified.
The following conditions are and shall be deemed
by both parties to be part of the consideration for this
lease:
FIRST: The Lessee shall have the right to extend
this lease for the further period of one (1) year, and at
the expiration of said period, a further period of one (1)
year upon the payment of the sun of FIFTEEN HUNDRED and 00/100
DOLLARS ($1500.00) per year in advance.
SECOND:
The lessee shall have the right at the
expiration of one (1) year from date hereof, or two (2) years
from date hereof, to cancel this lease upon the payment to the
Lessor of the sun of THREE THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY and
00/100 DOLLARS ($3,750.00); and it is hereby understood and
agreed as a consideration for this lease that the said sum
of $3,750.00 shall be paid to the lessor at the expiration of
the perior of three (3) years mentioned herein if said lease
is not renewed at said time.
In the event of the extension
of this lease for a period of one or two years, the said sum
of $3,750.00 shall not be payable until the lease is terminated;
this being the estimated amount for re-conditioning the land for
the purposes for which it is now used.
THIRD:
The Iessee shall have the right to construct,
erect, maintain upon the demised property, and remove at the
termination of this lease any buildings, roads, machinery, equipment,
telephone lines, pipe lines, power lines and other structures which
may be necessary, convenient or incidental to the operation of an
air port; and if any of said structures are not removed within
ninety (90) days from and after the termination of this lease

sum of FIFTEEN HUNDRED and 00/100 DOILARS ($1500.00) as rental
for each succeeding year, until the termination of this
lease, as hereinafter specified.
The following conditions are and shall be deemed
by both parties to be part of the consideration for this
lease:
FIRST: The Lessee shall have the right to extend
this lease for the further period of one (1) year, and at
the expiration of said period, a further period of one (1)
year upon the payment of the sun of FIFTEEN HUNDRED and 00/100
DOLLARS ($1500.00) per year in advance.
SECOND:
The lessee shall have the right at the
expiration of one (1) year from date hereof, or two (2) years
from date hereof, to cancel this lease upon the payment to the
Lessor of the sun of THREE THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY and
00/100 DOLLARS ($3,750.00); and it is hereby understood and
agreed as a consideration for this lease that the said sum
of $3,750.00 shall be paid to the lessor at the expiration of
the perior of three (3) years mentioned herein if said lease
is not renewed at said time.
In the event of the extension
of this lease for a period of one or two years, the said sum
of $3,750.00 shall not be payable until the lease is terminated;
this being the estimated amount for re-conditioning the land for
the purposes for which it is now used.
THIRD:
The Iessee shall have the right to construct,
erect, maintain upon the demised property, and remove at the
termination of this lease any buildings, roads, machinery, equipment,
telephone lines, pipe lines, power lines and other structures which
may be necessary, convenient or incidental to the operation of an
air port; and if any of said structures are not removed within
ninety (90) days from and after the termination of this lease
- 2-

or any extension thereof, the
same
shall become and remain
the property of the Iessor.
It is hereby understood and agreed
that the lessor shallhave the right to sub-let any concessions
incidental to the operation of an air port.
FOURRE:
The consent of the Lessor must be secured
for any seeding that may be done by the Lessee in order that
no deleterious grasses will be grown on the property.
FIPPI:
The Lessor shall maintain during the period
of this lease the pumping plant now on the property, but
in the event that any additional pumping is required by the
Lessee the cost of said additional pumping will be born by
the said Lessee.
SIXIE:
The Lessor shall maintain during the
period of this lease the levees now surrounding the herein
demised property, but will not be responsible for any damages
resulting from the breaking of the saidelevees.
SEVENTIL:
It is hereby understood and agreed that
in the event that the lessee desires a roadway over the adjoining.
land of the Lessor, such privilege shall be granted; said
roadway to be located as desigated by the lessor.
BI.CISH:
It is hereby understood and agreed that
the Lessee shall have the right to remove material from the
abandoned levees on the adjoining land of the Lessor for
the purpose of filling depressions on the land herein denised.
JI: Upon the termination of the lease, the
Lessee is to remove all foreign substances such as cinders,
gravel, or conerete placed on the property by the Lessee, and
in making such removals the Lessee shall be permitted to dump
the same in the old borrow pit or sloughs on the property
herein demised.

the cost of said additional pumping will be born by

SIXIH: The Lessor shall maintain during the

demised property, but will not be responsible for any damages

SEVENTH:
It is hereby understood and agreed that
in the event that the Lessee desires a roadway over the adjoining
land of the Lessor, such privilege shall be granted; said
roadway to be located as designated by the Lessor.
EI GITH:
It is hereby understood and agreed that
the Lessee shall have the right to remove material from the
abandoned levees on the adjoining land of the Lessor for
the purpose of filling depressions on the land herein demised.
NINTH: Upon the termination of the lease, the
Lessee is to remove all foreign substances such as cinders,
gravel, or concrete placed on the property by the Lessee, and
in making such removals the lessee shall be permitted to dump
the same in the old borrow pit or sloughs on the property
herein demised.
